text: The following lists events that have happened in 1861 in the Qajar dynasty. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Naser al-Din Shah Qajar ==Event== * Mozaffar ad-Din Shah Qajar was named as crown prince. He was also appointed as governor of Azerbaijan and sent to Tabriz. ==References== Iran Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1860s in Iran Iran
title: 1861 in Iran
